pkgmetadata.longdescription: Repeated Measures with Attrition: Sample Sizes and Power Levels for 2 Groups // For the calculation of sample size or power in a two-group repeated measures design, accounting for attrition and accommodating a variety of correlation structures for the repeated measures; details of the method can be found in the scientific paper: Donald Hedeker, Robert D. Gibbons, Christine Waternaux (1999) doi:10.3102/10769986024001070.
